headline.main: Bird Flu Spreads to Iowa Turkey Flock; 6th Midwest State
headline.print_headline: Bird Flu Spreads to Iowa Turkey Flock; 6th Midwest State

docs.snippet: A bird-flu strain that has already led to the deaths of nearly 2 million turkeys nationwide spread to an Iowa turkey farm, authorities said on Tuesday, bringing to six the number of states hit with the outbreak that was also confirmed at eight mor...
docs.lead_paragraph: A bird-flu strain that has already led to the deaths of nearly 2 million turkeys nationwide spread to an Iowa turkey farm, authorities said on Tuesday, bringing to six the number of states hit with the outbreak that was also confirmed at eight more farms in Minnesota.

headline.main: Kidnapping Foiled; Abductor Couldn't Drive a Stick Shift
headline.print_headline: Kidnapping Foiled; Abductor Couldn't Drive a Stick Shift

docs.snippet: Police say a kidnapping in South Carolina was thwarted because the would-be abductor couldn't operate a manual stick shift in the victim's car....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police say a kidnapping in South Carolina was thwarted because the would-be abductor couldn't operate a manual stick shift in the victim's car.

headline.main: Flag Raising at Fort Sumter Recalls Civil War's End 150 Years Ago
headline.print_headline: Flag Raising at Fort Sumter Recalls Civil War's End 150 Years Ago

docs.snippet: Civil War re-enactors raised an American flag at the Fort Sumter National Monument during a ceremony on Tuesday commemorating the 150th anniversary of the symbolic end to the four-year conflict in the place where it began....
docs.lead_paragraph: Civil War re-enactors raised an American flag at the Fort Sumter National Monument during a ceremony on Tuesday commemorating the 150th anniversary of the symbolic end to the four-year conflict in the place where it began.

headline.main: US Justice Department to Review California City's Police
headline.print_headline: US Justice Department to Review California City's Police

docs.snippet: The U.S. Justice Department said Tuesday that it will review hiring, training and oversight in a wide-ranging review of the Calexico Police Department, a step city officials said would help restore public confidence....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Justice Department said Tuesday that it will review hiring, training and oversight in a wide-ranging review of the Calexico Police Department, a step city officials said would help restore public confidence.
